body:
William Sidney Cooper was an English landscape artist, best known for his paintings of the countryside around Herne Bay in Kent. Cooper studied under his great-uncle, Thomas Sidney Cooper, one of England's most prominent mid-19th century painters. As with his great-uncle, the younger Cooperâ€™s forte was cattle and sheep, which are featured prominently in his watercolour and oil paintings. Cooper became a successful artist and exhibited at the Royal Academy, the Royal Society of British Artists, and the Royal Watercolour Society.

High auction record for this artist is $33,760.
dimensions: Watercolor, 7.75 x 10.8 inches / Signed lower left
metaDescription: William Sidney Cooper, British Artist From 1854-1927 - Sheep On The Coast Watercolor Painting For Sale - 7.75x10.8 Inches - Signed Lower Left.
metaTitle: William Sidney Cooper - Sheep on the Coast Painting For Sale
title: Sheep on the Coast
